title: looking for Southern League: Lafiite, Molesworth, Ryan & Shaughnessy
author: rfitts

posts.post_title: looking for Southern League: Lafiite, Molesworth, Ryan & Shaughnessy
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for Southern League: Lafiite, Molesworth, Ryan & Shaughnessy in PSA A, 1, 1.5 or 2 condition.  No major damage or writing on the front but small paper loss is ok if it doesn't impact the picture much.  I want to stay under $80 for the first 3 cards but will pay more for Shaughnessy.
rob

Hi Rob,

I have this Molesworth Old Mill that I would sell for $60 pp no fees
or $63 pp goods shipping included.

Patrick
